interests.title: Research Interests
interests.text: My main research interests currently lie in machine learning problems inspired by other disciplines, solving complex real-world problems with AI, and creative AI projects.

about.title: About
about.text:
Master's student in Machine Learning at University of Montreal / Mila.Hobbies: Reading, puzzles, crochet, occasional decluttering,recipe collector; curious about new disciplines and cultures, drawn to beauty and color; not good at any courage-heavy sport. 
 “To me, the world is a room filled with countless black boxes. And I'm in the corner of one of them. I strive to see every corner of this box clearly. Then I want to jump into another box and unravel what's inside. Finally, I want to put all these messed-up boxes in order.”
